mapper.select: SELECT m.id AS id, d.id AS receiveId, m.material_name AS materialName, u.user_name AS userName, d.mater_num AS materNum, u.login_act AS loginAct, d.create_time AS createTime, d.approval_state AS approvalState, d.speed_case AS speedCase, d.receive_reason AS receiveReason, d.is_purchase AS isPurchase FROM tbl_mater_receive d LEFT JOIN tbl_material_info m ON m.id = d.mater_id LEFT JOIN tbl_user u ON u.id = d.user_id WHERE d.is_delete = 1 AND d.approval_user_id = #{userId} AND d.approval_state = 0 ORDER BY d.create_time DESC

SELECT m.id AS id, d.id AS receiveId, m.material_name AS materialName, u.user_name AS userName, d.mater_num AS materNum, u.login_act AS loginAct, d.create_time AS createTime, d.approval_state AS approvalState, d.speed_case AS speedCase, d.receive_reason AS receiveReason, d.is_purchase AS isPurchase FROM tbl_mater_receive d LEFT JOIN tbl_material_info m ON m.id = d.mater_id LEFT JOIN tbl_user u ON u.id = d.user_id WHERE d.is_delete = 1 AND d.approval_state = #{approveState} ORDER BY d.create_time DESC
